list_definition.definition: a person who designs, makes, or works with, machinery
(usually civil engineer) a person who designs, constructs, or maintains roads, railways/railroads, bridges, sewers etc.
an officer who manages a ship’s engines.
to arrange by skill or by cunning means

list_ex_of_english: The design process was performed by a team made up of a structural engineer, a construction planner, and a project manager.
Can we exploit understanding of the molecular organisation of elastic fibres to engineer robust replacement elastic tissues such as small-diameter arteries and ligaments?
During its life cycle, engineers and designers make many representations of a product.
The presented architecture assists the knowledge engineer in establishing a proper framework for this type of formalisation.
Being able to answer such questions is central to understanding engineered products.
A design standards review forum was set up consisting of four senior engineers.
He further repeats the tired official lie that war veterans engineered the subsequent farm invasions.
The understanding of a domain is very difficult to explicate and requires the highest skill from the knowledge engineer in elicitation.
